



安川电机 MP/CP 系列(UDP)




(0 - 65534)
GMW0 10
	11 01 00 00 00 00 28 00 00 00 00 00 1a 00 20 0d 10 00 0a 00 00 00 01 00 02 00 03 00 04 00 05 00 06 00 07 00 08 00 09 00
	11 02 00 00 00 00 28 00 00 00 00 00 1a 00 20 0d 10 00 0a 00 00 00 01 00 02 00 03 00 04 00 05 00 06 00 07 00 08 00 09 00
	11 03 00 00 00 00 28 00 00 00 00 00 1a 00 20 0d 10 00 0a 00 00 00 01 00 02 00 03 00 04 00 05 00 06 00 07 00 08 00 09 00
	11 04 00 00 00 00 28 00 00 00 00 00 1a 00 20 0d 10 00 0a 00 00 00 01 00 02 00 03 00 04 00 05 00 06 00 07 00 08 00 09 00
GMW0 20
	11 01 00 00 00 00 3c 00 00 00 00 00 2e 00 20 0d 10 00 14 00 00 00 01 00 02 00 03 00 04 00 05 00 06 00 07 00 08 00 09 00 0a 00 0b 00 0c 00 0d 00 0e 00 0f 00 10 00 11 00 12 00 13 00
GMW10 20
	11 01 00 00 00 00 3c 00 00 00 00 00 2e 00 20 0d 10 00 14 00 0a 00 0b 00 0c 00 0d 00 0e 00 0f 00 10 00 11 00 12 00 13 00 14 00 15 00 16 00 17 00 18 00 19 00 1a 00 1b 00 1c 00 1d 00
GMW65530 5
	11 01 00 00 00 00 1e 00 00 00 00 00 10 00 20 0d 10 00 05 00 fa ff fb ff fc ff fd ff fe ff



(0 - 7FFF)
GIW0 10
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 00 00 02 00
GIW0 20
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 00 00 02 00
GIWA 10
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 0a 00 01 00
GIWA 20
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 0a 00 01 00
GIW10 10
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 10 00 01 00
GIW10 20
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 10 00 01 00
GIW7FF0 16
	11 01 00 00 00 00 16 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 20 0a 10 00 f0 7f 01 00



最多读取125个
(0 - 40950)(地址个位数只能为0)
GMB0 10(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 00 00 00 a0
	11 02 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 00 00 00 a0
	11 03 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 00 00 00 a0
	11 04 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 00 00 00 a0
GMB0 64(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 00 00 04 00
GMB10 10(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 00 10 00 a0
GMB40900 5(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 01 10 ff a0 00 50



最多读取125个
(0 - FFF0)(地址个位数只能为0)
GIB0 10(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 02 10 00 00 00 a0
GIB0 20(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 02 10 00 00 01 40
GIB0 124(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 02 10 00 00 07 c0
GIBFF00 16(位)
	11 01 00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00 00 00 07 00 20 02 10 ff 00 01 00
